content: gauge is not important for this project you can make it with any yarn and needle combination that you like the listed gauge and yarn weight are just examples the one row wonder shawl might just be the perfect pattern with only one row to memorize you ll have a brand new shawl with almost no effort the one row wonder can be knit at any gauge and with any yarn it s a perfect way to use up leftover yarn or that extra-special skein that s been waiting in your stash you know the one the finished shawl has a unique shape which wears like a scarf but has the look of a triangle shawl the one row wonder will knit up in no time and quickly become a favorite part of your wardrobe
